article_text:
Caitlin Jacob, Gannett Louisiana consumer experience director, helps distribute supplies to teachers in 2014. More than 400 teachers have been adopted through The Daily Advertiser’s program so far this year. (Photo: File photo)

Click on any of the links below to learn more about a teacher and to view their wish list. If you're interested in adopting a teacher, please email helpteachers@theadvertiser.com, and include the name of the teacher you want to adopt, along with your contact information.

Have questions about this project? Get answers in our FAQ.

To see a list of teachers who have already been adopted, please click here.

The deadline for teachers to submit wish lists was July 8.

article_summary:
(Photo: File photo)Click on any of the links below to learn more about a teacher and to view their wish list.
More than 400 teachers have been adopted through The Daily Advertiser’s program so far this year.
Caitlin Jacob, Gannett Louisiana consumer experience director, helps distribute supplies to teachers in 2014.
To see a list of teachers who have already been adopted, please click here.
If you're interested in adopting a teacher, please email helpteachers@theadvertiser.com, and include the name of the teacher you want to adopt, along with your contact information.
